mapper.select: SELECT ID , CUSTOMER_ID , RECEIVED_AT , DEVICE_REPORTED_TIME , FACILITY , PRIORITY , FROM_HOST , MESSAGE , NT_SEVERITY , IMPORTANCE , EVENT_SOURCE , EVENT_USER , EVENT_CATEGORY , EVENT_ID , EVENT_BINARY_DATA , MAX_AVAILABLE , CURR_USAGE , MIN_USAGE , MAX_USAGE , INFO_UNIT_ID , SYS_LOG_TAG , EVENT_LOG_TYPE , GENERIC_FILE_NAME FROM dev.SYSTEM_EVENTS ORDER BY ID ASC LIMIT #{_skiprows} , #{_pagesize}

SELECT ID , CUSTOMER_ID , RECEIVED_AT , DEVICE_REPORTED_TIME , FACILITY , PRIORITY , FROM_HOST , MESSAGE , NT_SEVERITY , IMPORTANCE , EVENT_SOURCE , EVENT_USER , EVENT_CATEGORY , EVENT_ID , EVENT_BINARY_DATA , MAX_AVAILABLE , CURR_USAGE , MIN_USAGE , MAX_USAGE , INFO_UNIT_ID , SYS_LOG_TAG , EVENT_LOG_TYPE , GENERIC_FILE_NAME FROM dev.SYSTEM_EVENTS WHERE ID = #{id}
